issue.title: Is the new simulator working for anyone?

content.raw: Hector, I’m glad it's now working for you. Regarding the controller, we’re going to update the content of the Example Setup page to explain how to configure the Logitech F310 or other controllers. Currently, the [PS3 controller](https://www.walmart.com/ip/Wireless-Bluetooth-controller-for-Playstation-3-PS3-Black/232377887?wmlspartner=wlpa&selectedSellerId=14467&adid=22222222227140108558&wl0=&wl1=g&wl2=c&wl3=250566557186&wl4=pla-410844108947&wl5=9032171&wl6=&wl7=&wl8=&wl9=pla&wl10=118781227&wl11=online&wl12=232377887&veh=sem&gclid=EAIaIQobChMIl9bHvqf44gIVyrXACh0i9QYAEAQYASABEgKujPD_BwE) is the one set as the default.
content.html: Hector, I’m glad it's now working for you. Regarding the controller, we’re going to update the content of the Example Setup page to explain how to configure the Logitech F310 or other controllers. Currently, the PS3 controller is the one set as the default.
